 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצָה‎</span>] **verb Niph\`al, Hiph\`il** ==struggle== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hithpa\`el ([[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]<sup>928</sup>); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְצָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***quarrel***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***apprehendit, arripuit*** aliquem antiis suis, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***vellere, evellere***, are perhaps denominative from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצָה‎</span>), so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]); — 

**Niph\`al** reciprocal ***struggle with each other***: ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּצוּ‎</span> [[Exod.21.22|Exod 21:22]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Lev.24.10|Lev 24:10]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[2Sam.14.6|2Sam 14:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְדָּו‎</span> [[Deut.25.11|Deut 25:11]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצִּים‎</span> [[Exod.2.13|Exod 2:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); all of physical struggle, wrestling, and the like. **Hiph\`il** ***engage in a struggle*** against: ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצּוּ‎</span> [[Num.26.9|Num 26:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>); ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצֹּתָם‎</span> v[[Num.26.9|Num 26:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצּוֺתוֺ אֶת‎</span> [[Ps.60.2|Ps 60:2]] (title); only here of ***war***, hence [[BDB#Klo|Klo's]] suggestion (compare [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>13</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכּוֺתוֺ‎</span> is plausible (compare [[2Sam.8.3|2Sam 8:3]]; [[2Sam.8.5|2Sam 8:5]]; [[2Sam.8.9|2Sam 8:9]]). 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצָה‎</span>] **verb** ==fall in ruins==; — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַיִךְ תִּצֶּינָה מֵאֵין יוֺשֵׁב‎</span> [[Jer.4.7|Jer 4:7]] ***thy cities shall fall in ruins*** (read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנָּצֶינָה‎</span> **Niph\`al**). **Niph\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּלִּים נִצִּים‎</span> ***ruined heaps***, i.e. ruin-heaps, [[2Kgs.19.25|2Kgs 19:25]] = [[Isa.37.26|Isa 37:26]]. — On [[Jer.2.15|Jer 2:15]]; [[Jer.9.9|Jer 9:9]]; [[Jer.9.11|Jer 9:11]]; [[Jer.46.19|Jer 46:19]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצת‎</span>. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצץ‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצָתָהּ‎</span> Lev [[Jer.1.16|Jer 1:16]] see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצָה‎</span> above
